heading: time_sampled
meaning: time the on-site samples were taken, when sampling began

heading: site_order
meaning: order of sites from the source (from Pentlands to Peffermill)

heading: landuse_type
meaning: land use categories, A = natural woodland, B = managed woodland, C = urban park, D = suburban, E = urban, F = grassland

heading: distance_source_km
meaning: distance of the site from the source (first point), in km

heading: width1_cm
meaning: river width, first reading, in cm

heading: avg.width_cm
meaning: average river width from 3 readings, in cm

heading: depth1_cm
meaning: river depth from midpoint, first reading, in cm

heading: avg.depth_cm
meaning: average river depth from midpoints, in cm

heading: v.time1_s
meaning: time to travel distance, used for velocity calculation, first reading, in s

heading: avg.v.time_s
meaning: average time to travel distance, used for velocity calculation, in s

heading: avg.velocity_ms
meaning: average river velocity from 3 readings, in m per s

heading: sediment1_cm
meaning: sediment size, first rock, in cm

heading: avg.sediment_cm
meaning: average sediment size from 10 random rock selections, in cm

heading: turbidity1_FTU
meaning: water turbidity, first reading, in FTU

heading: avg.turbidity_FTU
meaning: average water turbidity from 3 readings, in FTU

heading: color1_mgLPt
meaning: water color, first reading, in mg/L of platinum

heading: avg.color_mgLPt
meaning: average water color from 3 readings, in mg/L of platinum

heading: conductivity1_uScm
meaning: water conductivity, first reading, in microsiemens per cm

heading: avg.conductivity_uScm
meaning: average water conductivity from 3 readings, in microsiemens per cm

heading: pH1
meaning: water pH, first reading

heading: avg.pH
meaning: average water pH

heading: nitrate1
meaning: nitrate concentration, first reading, no dilution factor counted, in UNIT

heading: nitrate1x3
meaning: nitration concentration * 3, accounts for a 1:3 dilution, in UNIT

heading: avg.nitrate
meaning: average nitrate concentration from 3 readings with dilution factor accounted for, in UNIT

heading: phosphate1
meaning: phosphate concentration, first reading, in UNIT

heading: avg.phosphate
meaning: average phosphate concentration from 3 readings, in UNIT

heading: BOD_date
meaning: date biological oxygen demand was conducted, O2 reading date

heading: BOD_time
meaning: time biological oxygen demand was conducted, O2 reading time

heading: BOD_DOmgL
meaning: biological oxygen demand, concentration of dissolved oxygen, in mg O2 per L

heading: BOD_DOperc
meaning: biological oxygen demand, in percentage of dissolved oxygen

heading: BOD_conduScm
meaning: conductivity using O2 probe for BOD, in microsiemens per cm

heading: BOD_spcuScm
meaning: specific conductivity using O2 probe for BOD, in microsiemens per cm

heading: BOD_tempC
meaning: water temperature using O2 probe for BOD, in ˚C

heading: absorbance1
meaning: UV absorbance at 254 nm, first reading

heading: avg.absorbance
meaning: average UV absorbance at wavelength of 254nm

heading: PS_Baetidae
meaning: pressure sensitivity score for Baetidae, based on abundance category (AB1, AB2, AB3)

heading: sum_PS
meaning: sum of pressure sensitivity scores for that site

heading: ASPT
meaning: average score per taxon, calculated by sum of PS divided by total number of taxa for the site
